alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 05 at 9:43PM PST until November 06 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 4000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches mainly along the crest and pass areas. * WHERE...East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
